text: Dear @JohnTory & @joe_cressy: How can the 2 of you allow this ⬇️⬇️ to happen. As a #Toronto resident & *ratepayer*, I’m appalled that I’m blocked from booking #covid19 #vaccine in other places but anyone in #Ontario can book one here. What are YOU doing to address this inequity? https://t.co/1j9c5imUDl
